snippet: If the Rangers win the regular-season finale Saturday night against Washington, they will be awarded the Presidents’ Trophy for the best record in the league.
lead_paragraph: If the Rangers win the regular-season finale Saturday night against Washington, they will be awarded the Presidents’ Trophy for the best record in the league.

headline.seo: Tortorella, Fined for Comments About Penguins, Turns Focus to Capitals
headline.main: Tortorella, Fined for Comments About Penguins, Turns Focus to Capitals
